title: Calories in a Patty Sausage
meta_description: Learn calories in patty sausage, with full nutrition breakdown including protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and easy tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Cooked pork breakfast sausage patty, standard size (~52 g), pan-fried without added oil or seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, meat type, size, cooking method, and added ingredients. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One pork sausage patty provides ~180 kcal and ~8 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp oil for frying per patty

faqs.q: How many calories in one patty sausage?
faqs.a: About 180 kcal for a standard cooked pork sausage patty.

faqs.q: What is the protein in patty sausage?
Are sausage patties high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, typically ~500 mg sodium per patty; opt for low-sodium varieties.

faqs.q: Calories in turkey vs pork patty sausage?
faqs.a: Turkey is lower at ~130 kcal per patty compared to pork's 180 kcal.

faqs.q: Does cooking method affect calories in patty sausage?
faqs.a: Pan-frying adds calories if oil is used; baking or grilling keeps it closer to base values.
